home.parrafo-info: üë®‚Äçüéì I am a Systems Engineering student, a career I am deeply passionate about because it allows me to develop technological solutions that transform ideas into reality. I am motivated to learn more about programming, databases, and software development every day, with the goal of becoming a professional capable of bringing innovation and contributing to technological advancement in my field.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: I am a Systems Engineering student at the Universidad Peruana Los Andes, focused on the analysis, design, and development of technological solutions that respond to current needs. Throughout my studies, I have acquired knowledge in programming, databases, networks, and software project management, which allows me to have a comprehensive view of the engineering field and its impact on different sectors.
